mapper.update: update tbl_file SET file_status = 'inactive', updated_date = NOW() WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM tbl_member_file WHERE member_id = #{memberId}) AND file_status = 'active'
mapper.select: select f.id,f.file_name,f.file_original_name,f.file_size,f.file_path,f.file_content_type,mf.member_id,f.created_date,f.updated_date FROM tbl_file f JOIN tbl_member_file mf ON f.id = mf.id WHERE mf.member_id = #{memberId} AND f.file_status = 'active' ORDER BY f.id DESC LIMIT 1
